setup2fa.unableToScan: Unable to scan? You can show the secret key :

successModal.title: Success
successModal.message: You successfully set-up TOTP authentication on your account. You will be prompted to enter the code on each log-in.

unlink.title: 2FA unlinked
unlink.description: Your two-factor authentication has been successfully removed. You can re-enable it at any time in your account settings.

logIn.title: Log-in

about.title: About
about.description: Env-Manager simplifies environment variable management for teams, ensuring seamless collaboration and real-time updates.

heading.title: Real-time Collaboration
heading.description: Push once, sync everywhere. Instantly update environment variables across your entire team.

card1.title: Control Who Sees What
card1.description: Share variables securely with teammates. Assign roles and ensure sensitive data is only accessible to the right people.

card2.title: All Your Variables, One Secure Hub
card2.description: Easily manage environment variables for all your projects in one place, with a clean UI and powerful CLI.

card3.description: With env-manager, teams stay in sync. Add a variable once, and it instantly reaches very team member—no more outdated .env files!
card3.title: Effortless Collaboration with Shared Variables

card4.title: Sync Variables in Seconds
card4.description: Pull and push environment variables seamlessly between your local setup and the cloud, keeping everything up to date.

heading.title: With us, integrating has never been easier
heading.description: Effortlessly switch to Env-Manager on new or existing projects. No need to change your workflow or learn new tools.

card1.title: Connect your projects
card1.description: Since environment variables are universal and language/framework agnostic, no special integration is needed.

card2.title: Secure & Manage with Ease
card2.description: Your environment variables are safely stored and easily accessible. Control access and update values effortlessly.

card3.title: Sync & Deploy Anywhere
card3.description: Pull your environment variables with a single command and seamlessly integrate them into any project, CI/CD pipeline, or local development.

languageSwitcher.title: Language Selection
languageSwitcher.text: You're currently on the {{pageLanguage}} version of the website but your browser's language is {{userLanguage}}.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long!
errors.needTOTP: TOPT authentication required. Please provide the TOTP code.
errors.projectNameTooShort: Project name must be at least 3 characters long
